content: Metamorphic Guard is a Python library for comparing program versions using metamorphic testing.
The library supports statistical analysis using bootstrap confidence intervals on pass-rate differences.
Ranking Guard is a reference project for search ranking algorithms that ensures search quality does not degrade.
Fairness Guard focuses on credit approval models and checks for disparate impact across demographic groups.
The LLM Guard demo shows how to evaluate chatbots without live API keys using a mock executor.
